documents.document: Spinster is just every single person from my Twitter timeline elbowing each other.

RT @motherofnaggins: not gay as is happy, but queer as in I had a panic attack during my junior cert business exam and they just never stop…
@jiffington I did https://t.co/abqthPQ4cA
RT @toastykneecaps: 🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈 https://t.co/xcCrSA6kyq
Even my getting ready for Pride look is pink https://t.co/yhgORrBauR
Panti is like the gay White Moose Café.
@SeanSlevo95 Literally like why do we have to blame ourselves for homophobia? They’re not part of our community, they’re just fucking tapped.
I would @ panti but I have her blocked because I love myself

I fucking hate when the “homophobes are actually closeted gays” mindset raises its ugly head.
Just because other people hate gay people, doesn’t mean that we inherently hate ourselves.
@TheresaNewIdea @paulodonoghue93 Oh my god I DO!!! That is going to be my Pride drink.
Fuck off Smirnoff, if I want a label I can have one thank you very much.
RT @greeneggs_: lana del neigh https://t.co/BmVBMvvKiI

Me: okay brain time to come up with a funny tweet
Brain: tweet about how you’re too warm again
At least it’s great drying weather.
@alextleach @SamCeladon ❤️🌱
We had a big gay cake in work today and town is full of gays and it just feels like a great day to be gay.
@himynameisaine I haven’t even looked at the timeline, I am only looking at my own tweets which tbh is the best kind of twitter

RT @greeneggs_: Me: surely there won’t be any spoilers on the tl yet
Drag Race stans: https://t.co/kcK9dEgmvN
@cathly_ lmaoooo I bet he can’t keep his plants alive
@cathly_ omg I don’t watch is there a pic somewhere??
@brilliantshane I am very seriously considering sleeping in work as there’s air con

I am going to say it. Unfollow me if you will.
It is
𝒕𝒐𝒐
hot

It’s just
so
hot
I may be melting but my tomatoes are loving this heat 🍅 https://t.co/Y86LAKDT1n
Fuck u heteronormativity https://t.co/YFvRJ8gtq1
@samwhatislife Oh my god
Right I am buying white shoes and fucking dye because this city is H O M O P H O B I C.
@__tommyb_ Jesus that must be tough. Even finding 11s/12s is difficult.
Penneys only do these up to size 8. HOMOPHOBIC. https://t.co/LQ3169yhq0
Every single clothes shop in town has a *-_-*sHOw y0uR pRIde*-_-* slogan in the window yet not one of them has a pink pair of shoes. This is homophobic.
It’s too https://t.co/89hT5ys2bW
@DavidMJTDoyle All I want to do is stand inside places with air con that is all my body will let me do
@brutalistbebe At one point I wanted to live in a hot country but this... is too much. Iceland or nothing I think.
I just want to be cold.
Doctor: do u have a fever Me: sorry have u been outside

Went home from work today because I am sick and people were commenting how I didn’t look great and my lips were dry.
Just realised I literally have toothpaste all over my mouth.
RT @The_LogLady: Just shouted “excuse me guys there’s a baby trying to sleep in here” at my neighbours. little do they know the baby ... is…
How is it so LOUD https://t.co/tEwgIc6i8V
Someone is playing tin whistle outside. Every single person has to have their window open because of the heat. It is also 11pm on a Tuesday. Could Stoneybatter not take a night off, just this once?
Those Smirnoff “labels are for bottles” ads remind me of the “there’s a reason you can’t erase your heart” girl from Vine.
@mormonhorse This sounds right up my street. Can’t wait to SAVE and not SPEND ALL MY MONEY
@mormonhorse I am going to end up buying some weird cryptocurrency, aren't I?
@himynameisaine Am actually kind of buzzed about it. It seems like an unreal idea.
@twpoconnor Yeah, I am thinking the same. Not sure what to use AIB for, if anything, but want to give it a good go.

Very tired of giving so much money in fees to AIB so I have ordered a Revolut card. Has anyone tried it before? I really like the round-up savings thing it does but has anyone used it properly for day-to-day stuff?
@veginity @brutalistbebe

My hot take is that the World Cup is just too much football.
